name: Aqua (itch)
description:
The flood is coming...

Can you turn all of the valves before you drown?

How to Play:

Scattered around the map are a series of green and red valves. Red valves will continuously leak water into the room until they are shut off. Green valves will continuously drain water from the room once turned on. Your goal is to turn all of the valves.

Doors can be opened and closed to control the flow of water, but once a room has been completely filled, it will begin to leak into adjacent rooms, even if the doors are closed.

Good luck and don't drown!
